org.epics.pvmanager

Class QueueCollector<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.epics.pvmanager.QueueCollector<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type contained in the queue
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Collector<T,List<T>>, ReadFunction<List<T>>, WriteFunction<T>

    public class QueueCollector<T>
extends Object
implements Collector<T,List<T>>
    Collects value at read rate and puts them in a queue.

    Always returns new value as every read clears the cache. The values are returned oldest value first. When maxSize is reached, the oldest values are discarded.

    Author:
    carcassi

      • setMaxSize

        public void setMaxSize(int maxSize)
        Changes the number of maximum values in the queue.

        If new maxSize is less than the current number of element in the queue, the old values are discarded.

        Parameters:
        maxSize - the maximum number of elements in the queue
